user_query: Based on the airline policy, can I cancel my ticket 10 hours before the flight?
response:
According to Swiss Airlines' cancellation policy, you can cancel your ticket without penalty within 24 hours of booking. However, if you are looking to cancel your ticket 10 hours before the flight, it is important to note that the 24-hour cancellation policy applies only to cancellations made shortly after booking. 

If you attempt to cancel your ticket 10 hours before the flight and it is beyond the 24-hour window from when you booked, you may be subject to cancellation fees or penalties, especially if you have a non-refundable ticket. Always check the specific terms and conditions of your ticket for details on cancellation policies and potential fees.

user_query: What are all the genres of Alanis Morisette songs?
response: The songs of Alanis Morissette are primarily categorized under the genre of **Rock**.
